text: Exocentroides flavovarius is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Breuning in 1957.Biolib.cz - Exocentroides. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Acanthocinini Category:Beetles described in 1957 Category:Taxa named by Stephan von Breuning
title: Exocentroides flavovarius
